body: I just can't forget the day I caught my mother with our black neighbour and the image of his big hard fat dick going in and out of my mother's wet pussy like a piston but the worst part of it when I tried to stop them but my bitch mother who supposed to protect me told me to fuck off and threw her pillow at me, I ran...
